title: What is the minimum quantity for a buy order in GStocks PH?
content:
#### ADVISORY: Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible. ## Articles in this section - [How can I buy PH stocks in GStocks PH?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/17532438364057-How-can-I-buy-PH-stocks-in-GStocks-PH) - [How can I sell PH stocks in GStocks PH?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31210966987161-How-can-I-sell-PH-stocks-in-GStocks-PH) - [How do I check the status of my GStocks PH order?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31211043753497-How-do-I-check-the-status-of-my-GStocks-PH-order) - [How can I change or cancel my GStocks PH order?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31211092525593-How-can-I-change-or-cancel-my-GStocks-PH-order) - [What are the GStocks PH buy and sell fees I need to know about?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/17542731035289-What-are-the-GStocks-PH-buy-and-sell-fees-I-need-to-know-about) - [What is the minimum quantity for a buy order in GStocks PH?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31257061031705-What-is-the-minimum-quantity-for-a-buy-order-in-GStocks-PH) ## Promoted articles - [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account) - [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification) - [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account) The minimum quantity of shares you need to purchase depends on the stock. Here are a few terms to know before making your buy order: **Board Lot:** The minimum purchase quantity **Fluctuation:** The minimum change in price Ultimately, the Board Lot is affected by the share price. Tap to see some examples | | | | --- | --- | | **Example A** | | **Stock Board Lot/ Min. No. of Shares to Buy** | 1,000 | | **Share Price** | 4.19 | | **Fluctuation** | 0.01 | | **Sample Acceptable Quantity of Shares you can buy** | 2,000
3,000

etc | | **Example B** | | **Stock Board Lot/Min. No. of Shares to Buy** | 100 | | **Share Price** | 9.8 | | **Fluctuation** | 0.01 | | **Sample Acceptable Quantity of Shares you can buy** | 2,100
2,200
2,300
etc | Tap to see the corresponding Board Lots and Fluctuations | | | | | | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | **Board Lots and Price Fluctuations** | | Price Range | Fluctuation | Board Lot | | 0.0001 | to | 0.0099 | 0.0001 | 1,000,000 | | 0.010 | to | 0.049 | 0.001 | 100,000 | | 0.050 | to | 0.2409 | 0.001 | 10,000 | | 0.250 | to | 0.495 | 0.005 | 10,000 | | 0.50 | to | 4.99 | 0.01 | 1,000 | | 5.00 | to | 9.99 | 0.01 | 100 | | 10.00 | to | 19.98 | 0.02 | 100 | | 20.00 | to | 49.95 | 0.05 | 100 | | 50.00 | to | 99.95 | 0.05 | 10 | | 100.00 | to | 199.90 | 0.10 | 10 | | 200.00 | to | 499.80 | 0.20 | 10 | | 500.00 | to | 999.50 | 0.50 | 10 | | 1,000 | to | 1,999 | 1.00 | 5 | | 2,000 | to | 4,998 | 2.00 | 5 | | 5,000 | to | UP | 5.00 | | ### **Need more Help?** For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles: - [How can I buy PH stocks in GStocks PH?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/17532438364057) - [How do I check the status of my GStocks PH order?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31211043753497) - [I topped up my GStocks PH Trading Wallet but it has not been reflected yet.
